q1: Were all the players in Colombia's 2018 World Cup squad full time players?
a1: Yes they're playing in professional teams
q2: What happened to the Scorpion Kick goalkeeper ?
a2: It is Rene Higuita and he is the goalkeeper coach for a team in Colombia.

a3: no, the country cannot support proper leagues to develop the talent needed to win the world cup
